Articles.Content:
Once again, TBIT has released what it hopes to be at least a decent project. In this one we have the first lander in the MML series, the MML-1. This versatile lander requires MechJeb (you can take if off if you're a good enough pilot) and can land anywhere. It also requires the NovaPunch Remix pack, just like the Skylab II and Armstrong Station, for the actual landing engine. This lander is great for those who want a simple design or for beginners to the game. Download link is below.

Enjoy responsibly!

-halocon

Note: This lander cannot return from the Mun. It won't have enough fuel.

Comment if you like it!
Hey mods, I don't mean this to be an infraction, but can one ask for one's OWN thread to be shut down? It so, please shut my thread down, as I no longer need it.
